long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install this extension to detect which Locale is detected by the Browser. This is a debugging tool to help you understand which language your browser is defaulting to.

It includes a 'new tab page' override to show how you can retrieve the Locale before making a search.
